scripts.build:module: echo INACTIVATED MODULE BUILD # tsc -p tsconfig.module.json
scripts.build:cli: echo INACTIVATED CLI BINARY BUILD # rollup -c | nexe --resource "./res/**/*" -o build/cytoscape-gsheets-cli
scripts.cli:debug: echo "Open about:inspect in Chrome -> Open dedicated DevTools for Node -> Resume script execution" && node --inspect-brk build/main/cli.js
scripts.cov: run-s build test:unit cov:html && opn coverage/index.html
scripts.version-major: git stash && run-s prepare && standard-version --release-as major
scripts.version-minor: git stash && run-s prepare && standard-version --release-as minor
scripts.version-patch: git stash && run-s prepare && standard-version --release-as patch
scripts.reset: git clean -dfx && git stash && npm i

scripts-info.info: Display information about the package scripts
scripts-info.fix: Try to automatically fix any linting problems
scripts-info.test: Lint and unit test the project
scripts-info.watch: Watch and rebuild the project on save, then rerun relevant tests
scripts-info.cov: Rebuild, run tests, then create and open the coverage report
scripts-info.doc: Generate HTML API documentation and open it in a browser
scripts-info.doc:json: Generate API documentation in typedoc JSON format
scripts-info.version: Bump package.json version, update CHANGELOG.md, tag release
scripts-info.reset: Delete all untracked files and reset the repo to the last commit
scripts-info.prepare-release: One-step: clean, build, test, publish docs, and prep a release
